summary: The diff implements all four requirements: REQ-1 (Super Admin hardcoded in backend with bypass logic), REQ-2 (admin query/mutation functions for listing/approving/rejecting users), REQ-3 (auth guard fix in Layout.tsx), and REQ-4 (AdminPage.tsx with tabs, approve/reject actions, and sidebar link). The implementation appears largely complete, though one minor acceptance criterion regarding 'registration date' display in the Admin Panel is not clearly evidenced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Admin Panel page must display registration date per user in the pending users list
missing_requirements.reason: The AdminPage.tsx UserRow component displays user name, email/principal, and phone, but there is no evidence of a registration date field being shown. The UserApprovalInfo type may carry a timestamp but it is not rendered in the visible truncated diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Color theme change from deep-blue/navy to emerald green and dark teal palette
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly lists 'Changing the visual design or color theme of the application' as a non-goal, yet frontend-file-summaries.txt and referenced files describe a full color theme change to emerald green and dark teal.
